org.happy.artist.rmdmia.roci
Interface ROCIHandlerInterface

public interface ROCIHandlerInterface

This interface directs received messages/data to/from ROCI/Provider to the proper message destination, and performs transformation services if needed.

Method Summary
 int getDataTransferMethod()
          Return the data transfer method the ROCIProvider implements.
 int getID()
          Return this plugin's ROCI ID.
 java.io.InputStream getInputStream()
          Return the set ROCI Plugin InputStream.
 java.io.OutputStream getOutputStream()
          Return the set ROCI Plugin OutputStream.

          Called by ROCI Plugin to push data to RMDMIA.
 void processOutgoing(byte[] data)
          Called by RMDMIA to push outgoing data.
 void setInputStream(java.io.InputStream is)
          Set the ROCI Plugin InputStream.
 void setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream os)
          Set the ROCI Plugin OutputStream.
 

Method Detail

getDataTransferMethod

int getDataTransferMethod()
Return the data transfer method the ROCIProvider implements. 0=streaming (setInputStream/setOutputStream methods), 1=bytes (processIncoming/processOutgoing methods). Default data transfer method is streaming.

Returns:
int 0=streaming, 1=bytes

setOutputStream

void setOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream os)
Set the ROCI Plugin OutputStream.

Parameters:
os - The OutputStream Object
